results.name: Coefficients of a generalized Pell-Lucas polynomial read by rows.
comment: A122075 is jointly generated with A037027 as an array of coefficients of polynomials u(n,x):  initially, u(1,x)=v(1,x)=1; for n>1, u(n,x)=u(n-1,x)+(x+1)*v(n-1)x and v(n,x)=u(n-1,x)+x*v(n-1,x).  See the Mathematica section. - _Clark Kimberling_, Mar 05 2012
